message: It's useful for all programmers who want to allow payments in their websites, regardless of the technology they are using
name: Building PCI compliant Django applications // Speaker Deck
caption: speakerdeck.com
description: If you currently accept credit cards with your Django application today, or you plan on accepting them in the future, then you will need to worry about PCI DSS. Learn what you need to do to make sure that your application is PCI DSS compliant, and if it is not, what you need to do to bring it into c...
